dc.title: Congressman Rick Renzi, Arizona 1st District, U.S. House of Representatives
dc.description: Congressman Rick Renzi, Representing Arizona's 1st Distict, Congressman Rick Renzi proudly represents the First District of Arizona in the United States House of Representatives. The 1st District is home to over 640,000 Arizonans and the total land area encompasses nearly half of the state in what could be described as one of the most diverse landscapes in the nation. An entirely rural district, from the foothills of Oracle and the mineral rich hillsides of Morenci to the Navajo Nation and Monument Valley in the north, the district carries the metro areas of Flagstaff, Show Low, Casa Grande, Safford, Payson, Prescott and Winslow.
